page.title: 15** FAVOURITE TOYS - BOYS **
page.content:
{SOME FAVOURITE TOYS FOR BOYS IN 1985
WHEN I GET TOYS I USUALLY GET "ACTION FORCE" OR "STAR WARS" FIGURES OR REMOTE CONTROL CARS AND WAGGONS AND BOATS. MY LITTLE BROTHER GETS "STICKEL BRICKS" AND OLD CARS AND MODERN CARS. THE MODERN CARS HE GETS ARE PICK UP TRUCKS, FORD, AUSTIN, VOLKSWAGON, PEUGOT AND GETS TOY BMXs ON WHICH YOU PULL A CORD AND IT ZOOMS OVER EVERYTHING IN SIGHT AND CHARGES OVER EVERYTHING MUD, STONE AND GLASS. IT TACKLES EVERYTHING. I ONCE GOT AN X-WING FIGHTER AND AN "AT AT". THEN OUR DAMIEN GOT AN X-WING FIGHTER AND AN "AT AT". I GOT AN "AT AT" DRIVER AS WELL.
{BY STEPHEN FIRTH AGED 9, ST. GREGORYS {PRIMARY SCHOOL.
